price: Ama wale wa mashakani hao watakuwamo Motoni wakiyayayatika na kukoroma.
arabic: فَأَمَّا ٱلَّذِينَ شَقُواْ فَفِي ٱلنَّارِ لَهُمۡ فِيهَا زَفِيرٞ وَشَهِيقٌ
footnotes: Ama wale wenye mashaka mwisho wao ni Motoni. Kuvuta pumzi kwao kutakuwa ni kwa machungu makubwa, na mikoromo na kuyayatika, wanapo vuta pumzi na kutoa.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: fa-ammā alladhīna shaqū fafī al-nāri lahum fīhā zafīrun washahīqun
